amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate all limitations on federal election campaign contributions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 111-514 to eliminate all limitations on federal election campaign contributions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 57 - 369 (Roll no. 388).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. King (IA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
